name: Pinnochio Paddler - Browser
description:
This is the Pinocchio Paddler game (https://adsjohansen.itch.io/pinocchio-paddler) created for the Community Game Jam, but playable in browser. I didn't learn how to export to WebGL until after the deadline, and felt it could disqualify me to upload anything 'additional' regarding the submission so I've waited until the results were made live to post this.

___________________________________________________

CONTROLS: 'Esc' to pause. Mouse buttons to move.

AUDIO created in: LeshyLabs SFDesigner: https://www.leshylabs.com/apps/sfMaker/ (SFX) Chrome Music Lab - Song Maker: https://musiclab.chromeexperiments.com/Song-Maker/ (Music)

ART created in: Affinity Photo (using an Intuos Draw tablet).

DESIGN done in Unity.

___________________________________________________
